answers.answer: Even if you gain a pound a week (which is recommended btw) you will have only gained about thirty pounds, all of which should be easily lost after baby is born. It's unhealthy to try to restrict weight too much.

I know how you feel! I'm almost 36 weeks and I've gained 16. I gained 5 lbs in a week and I almost cried.I'm just trying to increase the number of walks I go on and incorporate healthier snacks.  It seems like no matter what I do though,  the weight is still coming on :/
I hope I can loose it. Its hard .. And I even feel bugger than yesterday crazy right..
I'm 37 weeks and have gained 32 pounds! I wasn't gaining weight and the all of a sudden gained sooo much at once and got stretch marks because of it, oh well!

I went in at 32 weeks and had 6 lbs over two weeks and hadnt done anything different! I was like wth!! Then I went on maternity leave,went in today at 34 weeks and was terrified to step on scale (once again did NOTHING different besides NOT working) and LOST two pounds!! Lol so dont freak out over a jump in weight gain... it could just even itself out the next week!! Good luck everuone one!!! (Total weight gain 25lbs)

33 weeks and I've gained 17 lbs..its so crazy with this pregnancy I've gained so little compared to my other two and I got anemia gestational diabetes baby's measuring small not to mention I have low fluid with my first I gained 65 lbs with my second d I gained 40 lbs and with this one I thought I was actually doing good and ended up more complicated then my others I'm sure I'll pack on more lbs but hey with that's what pregnancy is
Good luck to u ladies.. I was concerned I'll just start doing routine walks maybe that can help

question: Hey ladies I will be 31 weeks Wednesday and so far I have gained 21 PDS.. I am very concerned because these are the last months were I can get bigger... AnY advice  to help me stay at this or just few more PDS.. Please help
title: weight
